swords.name: Envoys Edge
swords.lore: A dependable blade carried by the scouts.

swords.name: Officers Sword
swords.lore: A dependable blade carried by the scouts.

swords.name: The Eve Sword
swords.lore: A dependable blade carried by the scouts.

swords.name: Minty Fresh
swords.lore: A dependable blade carried by the scouts.

swords.name: Bone sword
swords.lore: A dependable blade carried by the scouts.

swords.name: Crab Saber
swords.lore: A dependable blade carried by the scouts.

swords.name: Grief
swords.lore: A dependable blade carried by the scouts.

swords.name: Epoch Blade
swords.lore: A dependable blade carried by the scouts.

swords.name: Porciline
swords.lore: A dependable blade carried by the scouts.

swords.name: Radiant Refraction
swords.lore: A dependable blade carried by the scouts.

swords.name: RC Blade
swords.lore: A dependable blade carried by the scouts.

swords.name: Short Hand
swords.lore: A dependable blade carried by the scouts.

swords.name: Wall Captain's Rapier
swords.lore: A light, precise sidearm for high-ranking officers, emphasizing speed and finesse.

swords.name: Gift Ribbon Foil
swords.lore: A rapier with a surprisingly sharp blade made from compressed festive ribbon, granting fast, light attacks.

swords.name: Pretzel Rod Rapier
swords.lore: A long, salted pretzel rod reinforced for combat. Its savory flavor is distracting to foes.

swords.name: Swordfish Bake
swords.lore: The hardened, baked bill of a swordfish, used as a naturally pointy thrusting weapon.

swords.name: Tea Cup Sword
swords.lore: A fine porcelain teacup acts as the guard for this delicate but sharp blade. Best used at formal duels.

swords.name: Harpoon Thruster
swords.lore: A repurposed harpoon used for quick, deep thrusts. A charged attack releases a powerful backward shove.

swords.name: Narwhal Tusk
swords.lore: The horn-like tooth of a Narwhal, revered by the Ice Elves as a pure, piercing weapon.

swords.name: Icicle Thorn
swords.lore: A needle-thin rapier made from magically compressed, long-lasting ice.

swords.name: Giant Sewing Needle
swords.lore: A massive sewing needle with a thread-wrapped grip and a button guard. Perfect for precision stabbing.

swords.name: Pipe Puncture
swords.lore: Various metal pipes welded and sharpened into a durable, unrefined rapier.

swords.name: Quill Puncture
swords.lore: A long quill with an enchanted, extremely sharp point that builds up poison damage.

swords.name: Slinky Saber
swords.lore: A compressed slinky forms the body of the blade. It can dramatically extend its reach on a charged lunge.

swords.name: Tesla Coil Rapier
swords.lore: A gear coil attached to a handle that discharges focused electricity on charged thrusts.

swords.name: Swift Needle
swords.lore: A lightning-fast thrusting sword favored by duelists.

swords.name: Wall Captain Great Sword
swords.lore: The ceremonial sword awarded to a Wall Captain, symbolizing unwavering dedication to duty.

swords.name: Sleigh Runner Blade
swords.lore: Crafted from a reinforced sleigh runner, giving it unparalleled straight-line speed.

swords.name: Bread Slicer
swords.lore: A gargantuan bread knife that delivers incredibly clean, deep cuts. Always slightly warm.

swords.name: Choc Wok
swords.lore: A massive slab of hardened chocolate, sweet in smell but brutally heavy in combat.

swords.name: Great Grater
swords.lore: A large blade covered in deep grating holes, designed to shred the armor of enemies.

swords.name: Ice Lolli Blade
swords.lore: A giant, frozen confection shaped like a sword. Cold enough to cause frost buildup quickly.

swords.name: Strife
swords.lore: A shard of ancient, pure ice. Its power builds in a widening circle around the wielder.

swords.name: Whalebone Greatsword
swords.lore: Forged from the fused spine bones of a gargantuan Arctic whale. Exceptionally strong and light for its size.

swords.name: Expenda-Man Sword
swords.lore: A futuristic sci-fi blade from an old action figure set. Its heavy attacks shoot fire slashes.

swords.name: Stained Glass Greatsword
swords.lore: A magnificent, full-sized blade constructed entirely from hardened stained glass panels.

swords.name: Teddy Bear Stitcher
swords.lore: A giant sewing needle mounted on a hilt. Used to stitch up toy breaches, but capable of devastating piercing damage.

swords.name: Frostfang
swords.lore: Forged by Ice Elf chiefs, its chill never fades.
